CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 13+3 - Right to an effective remedy (Article 13 - Effective remedy) (Article 3 - Degrading treatment;Prohibition of torture);Violation of Article 3 - Prohibition of torture (Article 3 - Inhuman treatment) (Substantive aspect);Violation of Article 13+3 - Right to an effective remedy (Article 13 - Effective remedy) (Article 3 - Inhuman treatment;Prohibition of torture)
TEXT: CARDINAL . The relevant details of the application are set out in the appended table .

CARDINAL . NORP The applicant complained of the inadequate conditions of his detention and the lack of medical care in custody . Relying on LAW he also alleged that no effective domestic remedies for his grievances had been available to him .
